revisionDesc.change: Editor of P.Köln 12. 481 addresses fact that the two fragments may not actually belong together (hand of fr. 1 is similar to, but smaller than, hand of fr. 2), though the kollesis along right hand margin argues for joining them. Fr. 1 bears 2 lines of text: line 1 = remains of 6 or 7 letters; line 2 = Διονυσί̣ω̣ι. Remains of line 1 identified as m2 and rest of text (line 2 of frag. 1 + lines 3-10 of frag. 2 ascribed to m1 > reason for my failing to have the text ok'd? letters

div.note:
Broken Leiden+ below saved to come back to later: <S=.grc <D=.1.fragment<=
$m1 1. ερ̣.1ι̣.2
$m2 2. Διονυσί̣ω̣ι - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
=>=D>
<D=.2.fragment<= 3. διατέτακται 4. εἰς ναῦλον χόρτου 5. (χα(λκοῦ)) ((τάλαντα)) <#ις=16#> <#᾿Δ=4000#> 6. καὶ εἰς σιταρχίας 7. τοῦ μετὰ Διονυσίου 8. πλοίου ((τάλαντα)) <#β=2#> <#᾿Βυξς=2466#> ((τετρώβολον)), 9. ((γίνεται)) ((τάλαντα)) <#ιθ=19#> <#υξς=466#> ((τετρώβολον)). 10. ((ἔτουϲ)) <#β̣=2#> Φαῶφι <#ιε̅=15#> =>=D>
